response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and functionality, it's worth more than $100 to us. Considering its true value and the benefits it offers, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special price of $120. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. We believe you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 120}
